statements: SELECT * FROM favorite_spots WHERE spot_category = 'Park';
SELECT spot_id, spot_name, average_rating FROM favorite_spots WHERE spot_type = 'Cafe';
SELECT spot_id, spot_name, internet_speed_Mbps FROM favorite_spots ORDER BY average_rating DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT spot_type FROM favorite_spots;
SELECT spot_name, spot_category FROM favorite_spots WHERE average_rating >= 4.5;
SELECT spot_name, spot_category, average_rating FROM favorite_spots WHERE spot_category = 'Cafe' ORDER BY average_rating DESC;
SELECT spot_id, spot_name, spot_type FROM favorite_spots WHERE internet_speed_Mbps > 50 ORDER BY spot_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM favorite_spots WHERE spot_type = 'Internet Speed Test' AND average_rating > 4.5 ORDER BY spot_id DESC;
SELECT spot_name, spot_category, internet_speed_Mbps FROM favorite_spots WHERE spot_category = 'Co-working Space' OR average_rating < 3.0 ORDER BY internet_speed_Mbps DESC;
SELECT spot_id, spot_name, spot_type, average_rating FROM favorite_spots WHERE spot_type IN ('Cafe', 'Co-working Space') AND internet_speed_Mbps BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY spot_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM work_cafes
SELECT name, location FROM work_cafes WHERE wifi_speed > 50
SELECT name, location, amenities FROM co_working_spaces WHERE membership_fee < 100
SELECT name, power_outlets FROM work_cafes WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT * FROM work_cafes WHERE wifi_speed IS NULL
SELECT * FROM work_cafes WHERE wifi_speed > 50;
SELECT name, location FROM co_working_spaces WHERE membership_fee < 1000.00;
SELECT * FROM work_cafes WHERE power_outlets = TRUE ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, location, amenities FROM co_working_spaces WHERE amenities LIKE '%conference room%';
SELECT cafe_id, name, location FROM work_cafes WHERE wifi_speed IS NOT NULL ORDER BY cafe_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM remote_work_cafes;
SELECT cafe_name, location FROM remote_work_cafes WHERE wifi_speed > 10;
SELECT space_name, amenities FROM co_working_spaces ORDER BY space_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM internet_speed_tests WHERE speed_download >= 50 ORDER BY speed_download DESC;
SELECT cafe_name, location, wifi_speed FROM remote_work_cafes WHERE wifi_speed < 20;
SELECT * FROM remote_work_cafes;
SELECT cafe_name, location FROM remote_work_cafes WHERE wifi_speed > 50 ORDER BY cafe_name DESC;
SELECT space_name, amenities FROM co_working_spaces WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT cafe_name, location, wifi_speed FROM remote_work_cafes WHERE wifi_speed BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY wifi_speed DESC;
SELECT space_name, location, amenities FROM co_working_spaces UNION SELECT cafe_name, location, wifi_speed FROM remote_work_cafes;
SELECT * FROM favorite_cafes;
SELECT name, location, wifi_speed FROM favorite_cafes WHERE wifi_speed > 50;
SELECT name, coffee_rating FROM favorite_cafes ORDER BY coffee_rating DESC;
SELECT space_id, name, amenities FROM coworking_spaces WHERE daily_rate < 50;
SELECT * FROM nomads WHERE favorite_cafe_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM favorite_cafes
SELECT name, location FROM coworking_spaces
SELECT nomad_id, name, favorite_cafe_id FROM nomads ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT * FROM speed_test_results WHERE upload_speed > 100 AND ping_time < 20
SELECT name, amenities, daily_rate FROM coworking_spaces WHERE daily_rate < 50 ORDER BY daily_rate ASC
SELECT * FROM remote_work_cafes;
SELECT cafe_name, location, rating FROM remote_work_cafes WHERE wifi_speed_mbps > 50;
SELECT space_id, space_name, amenities FROM co_working_spaces ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM internet_speed_test_results WHERE test_date >= '2021-10-01';
SELECT nomad_name, email, location, favorite_cafe_id FROM digital_nomads WHERE favorite_cafe_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT cafe_name, location, rating FROM remote_work_cafes ORDER BY rating DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT space_name, location, amenities FROM co_working_spaces WHERE rating >= 4.5 ORDER BY space_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT nomad_name, email, location FROM digital_nomads WHERE favorite_cafe_id IS NOT NULL AND location = 'Bali'

SELECT cafe_name, COUNT(review_id) AS num_reviews FROM remote_work_cafes JOIN cafe_reviews ON remote_work_cafes.cafe_id = cafe_reviews.cafe_id GROUP BY cafe_name HAVING num_reviews > 3 ORDER BY num_reviews DESC

SELECT nomad_name, cafe_name, review_text FROM digital_nomads JOIN cafe_reviews ON digital_nomads.nomad_id = cafe_reviews.nomad_id JOIN remote_work_cafes ON cafe_reviews.cafe_id = remote_work_cafes.cafe_id WHERE rating >= 4.0 ORDER BY nomad_name, cafe_name DESC LIMIT 5
